General.Name: Inversiones Nutravalor SA
General.Description: Inversiones Nutravalor S.A., an investment company, operates in the fishing industry in Chile. The company produces and sells fishmeal and fish oil. It also offers protein food products. The company was formerly known as Empresa Pesquera Eperva S.A. and changed its name to Inversiones Nutravalor S.A. in August 2021. Inversiones Nutravalor S.A. was founded in 1956 and is based in Santiago, Chile.
General.Address: Avenida el Golf 150, Santiago de Chile, Chile

3.Name: Mr. Jorge  Andueza Fabani
3.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
